-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `concesionario`.`version`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `concesionario`.`version` (
  `idversion` INT NOT NULL,
  `nombre_version` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idversion`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `concesionario`.`modelo`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `concesionario`.`modelo` (
  `idmodelo` INT NOT NULL,
  `idversion` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idmodelo`),
  INDEX `idversion_idx` (`idversion` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `modelo_version`
    FOREIGN KEY (`idversion`)
    REFERENCES `concesionario`.`version` (`idversion`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `concesionario`.`marca`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `concesionario`.`marca` (
  `idmarca` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `idmodelo` INT NULL,
  `nombre_marca` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idmarca`),
  INDEX `idmodelo_idx` (`idmodelo` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `marca_modelo`
    FOREIGN KEY (`idmodelo`)
    REFERENCES `concesionario`.`modelo` (`idmodelo`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `concesionario`.`auto`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `concesionario`.`auto` (
  `idauto` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `idmarca` INT NULL,
  `idmodelo` INT NULL,
  `idversion` INT NULL,

  `precio` INT NULL,
  `kilometros` INT NULL,
  `combustible` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `puertas` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `condicion` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idauto`),
  INDEX `idmarca_idx` (`idmarca` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `idversion_idx` (`idversion` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `idmodelo_idx` (`idmodelo` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `auto_marca`
    FOREIGN KEY (`idmarca`)
    REFERENCES `concesionario`.`marca` (`idmarca`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `auto_version`
    FOREIGN KEY (`idversion`)
    REFERENCES `concesionario`.`version` (`idversion`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,

    FOREIGN KEY (`idmodelo`)
    REFERENCES `concesionario`.`modelo` (`idmodelo`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;
